location: {"title": "classroom_location", "interactableObjects": ["ceiling light", "sunny window", "blackboard", "back of the classroom", "teacher desk", "Camera"]}

script.voice_line: I can't believe we just did that! Designing a flank detector in circuits is so cool!
That was amazing, team! You guys really nailed it. Flank detectors are essential in circuits, and you just created one from scratch.
Wonderful work, everyone! You've shown great skill and curiosity in designing this flank detector. It's a testament to the power of human ingenuity.
